title: DJ Mix Studio [Download]
description: DJ Mix Studio is full-featured and complete audio mixing software for both professional and novice DJ. DJ Mix Studio's innovative feature set, and user friendly interface will insure that you perform great audio mixes. DJ Mix Studio allows you to mix two or more tracks at the same time, provides instant BPM beat matching, remixing control, cross fading tracks with different selectable styles, cue up tracks, real time effects (Chorus, Distortion, Flanger, Reverb, Waves Reverb, Compressor, Echo, Gargle, Parametric Eq.), sampler decks with recorder, powerful equalizer system with predefined presets (Classical, Club, Dance, Bass, Bass Treble, Treble, Laptop Speaker, Hall, Live, Party, Pop, Reggae, Rock, Ska, Soft, Techno, Custom), seamless loops, pitch shifting, waveform illustration, audio CD extractor, record your mix or from any sources eg. Line-in input, and many more great features.DJ Mix Studio supports dual-sound card for real-time headphone monitoring or external mixer use. Playlist tracks are organized in a friendly view. You can save or load the playlist from formats M3U, PLS, WPL, and PDJ. DJ Mix Studio loads popular audio formats like MP3, WAV, AC3, OGG, WMA, FLAC, AAC, M4A, APE, VOX, VOC, AIFF and more.PC
Supported OS:   Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows
